title: The post 7:22 patch fps/perfomance issues/ afk punishments and glitches
body: since early decembe I, as many others, have been suffering with fps spikes game freezes post loadingscreen crashes, that got me unfairly on streak of afk/leaverbuster  punishments ( even tho in some cases i even managed to come back to game and win) that at moment reached the fucking 20 mins. mark. not happy with that, now in the last match of the current punishment, the q glithced and keeps on reseting. ( i tryed to add the print here but not sure how to) its now on nearly 1 hour ( as i type this it was on less than 5 minutes when reset to 20 again).

replies.body:
FPS issues are always a real pain in the rear so it sucks to hear you've been getting these since December, man. The leaverbuster looping is also... less than acceptable.
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

I do have somethings that I can try to help fix your FPS troubles though. You mentioned how it always happens specifically around the 20 minute mark. What I'm thinking is that something is happening at 20 minutes that your game isn't carrying out properly, and that thing is most likely Baron spawning if so. Perhaps you have some files that are either corrupt or missing that make the game freak out when they load, so try a client repair from the settings menu if you haven't first and foremost. Second, I always suggest making sure that your drivers are up to date when someone is experiencing FPS trouble. [**Check out this guide** ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq1)for steps to help walk you through that too, and let me know if any of that helps out.

As for the Leaverbuster looping like that, it's likely a really irritating bug that I sadly can't fix from here. If it's still plaguing you, hit up our Behavior team [**in a ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to examine the penalty and see if they can fix it. :)
